title: Technokraft
description: TECHNOKRAFT is a one of a kind event. It focuses on making the most innovative yet efficient manufacturer. TECHNOKRAFT sparks the inner entrepreneur in each participant. The prime objective is to teach the participants the utilisation of limited financial resources to create the most profitable product.  In this dynamic event, each round will reflect the results of the previous one. Teamwork will prove to be an integral factor as this event is based on understanding between the teammates. The final showdown will be the pitch. The teams which impress the audience and the judges in the final round will win exciting prizes.
